title: News View :: The World On Arirang
text: North Korean leader Kim Jong-un has criticized the regime for being overly reliant on South Korea for tourism at the North's famous Mount Geumgang.According to its state-run Rodong Sinmun newspaper on Wednesday, Kim inspected tourist sites at Mount Geumgang, and instructed all South Korean facilities be removed and to be re-built in a modern way.However, Kim stressed he'll welcome South Korean tourists to Mount Geumgang anytime, but added it was a "mistaken idea" for the mountain to be viewed as a symbol of North-South relations.
description: 한국을 대표하는 글로벌 방송! The World On Arirang!
